text: Grobiņas sporta centrs () is a Latvian football club based in Grobiņa and plays in the 2nd tier of Latvian football Latvian First League and the Latvian Football Cup. In 2016 Grobiņas SC won Kurzeme Regional League and therefore qualified for 2nd League final tournament in which they won as well (beating SK Cēsis in finals) and with that earning promotion to First League.http://www.tautasfutbols.lv/lff/grobinas-sc-triumfe-2-liga/ In their First League debut season they achieved 4th place.https://www.liepajniekiem.lv/sports/futbols/pirma-liga/debijas-sezonu- pabeidza-4-vieta-210685 Grobiņas SC also have agreement with FK Liepāja, thus having regular players joining/getting loaned from Liepaja.https://www.liepajniekiem.lv/sports/futbols/grobinas-futbols-un-pirma- liga-gaida-licenci-konsultes-dobrecovs-sadarbosies-ar-fk-liepaja-198226 ==Season By Season Results== :{|class="wikitable" |-bgcolor="#efefef" !
